name: Dragon Escape (GameBully77)
description:
Dragon Escape is a simple but difficult at times 2D platformer game where you have to parkour your way through the levels.

==================================

Features:
  • 3 Levels
  • Death Counter
  • Timer System

==================================

Glitch (IMPORTANT!):

The game glitches out when back out to the main menu too fast before waiting for the camara to go back to the character. after you die. This also happens when you back out when your taken damage. This glitch will give you invulnerability and would ruin the game experience making you able to speed run the game easier so please don't exploit it If you ever get that glitch just restart the game, the game loads fast so you won't lose time. I still haven't found a way to solve this glitch. 

  • If you ever get stuck on a door to go to the next room just walk back, then forward again and you should be able to pass, I don't know why this happens

==================================

Install instructions:
  1. Download the Windows version 
  2. Right click the zip file and "extract all"
  3. Run the game by then double-clicking Dragon Escape
If it gives you a Microsoft warning, just download it and click on more options and run anyway, there is no viruses I promise.
